AUTHOR: JJW & DeltaSigma (CollectorDevTeam)
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for installing our repo.  mcoc is a cog for Marvel's Contest of Champions
NAME: mcoc-cogs
SHORT: Collector Cogs designed for Alliance Management in Marvel's Contest of Champions
DESCRIPTION:
This repo contains a suite of cogs designed to power Collector, a RED instance.
The mcoc-cogs provide character data, user roster management tools, and alliance management tools for Marvel Contest of Champions.
